hero.headline: Stop Farming Blind. Start Using ARC the Right Way.
hero.subheadline: INTENT helps you focus on on-chain activities that the ARC team actually uses, not just spamming transactions.

problem.headline: Most users farm without knowing what they're doing

infrastructure.headline: INTENT helps you use ARC dApps for real, not just appear active.

whyDifferent.headline: This isn't a quest platform. This is an on-chain activity guide.

aboutProof.headline: Badges here aren't collections, but proof of activity.

ecosystem.headline: Built on ARC, trusted by the community

finalCta.headline: If you want to farm, at least do it the right way.
